verbose_text: Whether this is regulated by post-translational modification including acetylation of E2F1 or p21 Waf1 / Cip1, changes in sub-cellular localization of E2F1, or direct interaction of p21 Waf1 / Cip1 and E2F1 following panobinostat treatment are hypotheses we are currently exploring.
evidence: acetylation of E2F1 or p21 Waf1/Cip1
